channel.title: GameStop question
channel.description: Okay, so back when I bought my PS3 (August) I bought GoldenEye 007: Reloaded (great game, by the way) at GameStop, but they were out of cases for the game. Could I go back there with the game in the yellow paper case-thingy they put it in and ask for an actual case? Or would they think that's suspicious?

item.title: GameStop question
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
gamestop dumpsters are full of empty game cases. I work at a mall with 2 gamestops and I’ve seen them take the trash out. How desperate are you

Read full topic

item.title: GameStop question
item.dc:creator: stoneage
item.description:
Unless your receipt notes that you didn’t get a case then I’d imagine they just wouldn’t believe that you did not get one. Doesn’t hurt to call and ask, but I’m also not sure they would just have random empty 007 cases lying around.

Read full topic

item.title: GameStop question
item.dc:creator: ac3d
item.description:
M4TT:

I bought GoldenEye 007: Reloaded (great game, by the way) at GameStop, but they were out of cases for the game.

The fuck? are they asking to be put out of business by online stores?

Read full topic

item.title: GameStop question
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
just get a blank dvd box and print out the box cover

Read full topic
